tool.name: Get crosslinked nucleotides
tool.help:
bctools - Get crosslinked nucleotides from full alignments ==========================================================
Given coordinates of aligned reads in BED format, calculate positions of the crosslinked nucleotides. Crosslinked nts are assumed to be one nt upstream of the 5'-end of the read.
Input -----
* six column BED file containing coordinates of aligned reads
Output ------
* six column BED file containing coordinates of crosslinking events
